ld: Freedom of association - Allows individuals to form or join a group or association; allows individuals to not join a group or association

label: Stateless persons
description: Requires protection for stateless persons, asylum seekers, or refugees
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Stateless persons - Requires protection for stateless persons, asylum seekers, or refugees

label: Attorney general
description: Establishes an attorney general, public prosecutor, or prosecutor general to serve as the principal legal official, represent the government in legal proceedings, and give legal advice to the government
ld: Attorney general - Establishes an attorney general, public prosecutor, or prosecutor general to serve as the principal legal official, represent the government in legal proceedings, and give legal advice to the government

label: Legislator attendance
description: Requires legislators to attend legislative sessions or votes; can establish mandatory attendance at legislative sessions or punishment after a specified number of absences from legislative sessions
ld: Legislator attendance - Requires legislators to attend legislative sessions or votes; can establish mandatory attendance at legislative sessions or punishment after a specified number of absences from legislative sessions

label: Source of constitutional authority
description: Establishes the agent with the authority to install the constitution or from which the state derives its ultimate authority
ld: Source of constitutional authority - Establishes the agent with the authority to install the constitution or from which the state derives its ultimate authority

label: Balanced budget
description: Requires that the government pass a balanced budget in which incoming revenue meets or exceeds the value of the government's expenditures in a fiscal year
ld: Balanced budget - Requires that the government pass a balanced budget in which incoming revenue meets or exceeds the value of the government's expenditures in a fiscal year

label: Bank
description: Establishes a bank that formulates monetary policy, issues currency, regulates commercial banks, and provides financial and banking services
parent_category: Regulation and Oversight/Independent Agencies and Commissions
ld: Bank - Establishes a bank that formulates monetary policy, issues currency, regulates commercial banks, and provides financial and banking services

label: Binding effect of rights
description: Establishes whether or not private individuals are bound by rights
ld: Binding effect of rights - Establishes whether or not private individuals are bound by rights

label: Budget law
description: Establishes a special legislative process for the budget, which is legislation that lays out the revenues and expenditures for some period of time, usually in years
ld: Budget law - Establishes a special legislative process for the budget, which is legislation that lays out the revenues and expenditures for some period of time, usually in years

label: Business
description: Allows individuals to establish for-profit commercial endeavors
ld: Business - Allows individuals to establish for-profit commercial endeavors

label: Cabinet/ministers

ld: Defense minister - Establishes the qualifications that an individual must meet in order to serve as the defense minister, particularly being a civilian or a member of the military; specification that there be civilian control of the military

ld: Skin color - Relates to a person's physical characteristic of skin color

ld: Consumers - Protects consumers from harmful products and/or predatory or unethical business practices

ld: Ethnic community integration - Allows integration and partlcipation of minority ethnic communities; protects minority ethnic communities against forced assimilation; supports multinationalism, plurinationalism, or recognition of indigenous peoples

ld: Self-incrimination - Allows an individual to refuse to answer questions during an interrogation or in court if the questions would tend to confirm the individual's guilt

label: Naturalization
description: Grants citizenship to a foreigner through naturalization, whereby a person acquires a citizenship he or she did not have at birth
ld: Naturalization - Grants citizenship to a foreigner through naturalization, whereby a person acquires a citizenship he or she did not have at birth

label: Conscientious objection
description: Grants an exemption from military service to individuals who object to war on the basis of moral principles
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Conscientious objection - Grants an exemption from military service to individuals who object to war on the basis of moral principles

label: Tax exemption
description: Grants an exemption from taxation or required financial charges levied on other residents
ld: Tax exemption - Grants an exemption from taxation or required financial charges levied on other residents

label: Constitutional oath
description: Requires public officials to take an oath to support the constitution
ld: Constitutional oath - Requires public officials to take an oath to support the constitution

label: Occupation
description: Allows individuals to choose their occupation and their place of employment without interference
ld: Occupation - Allows individuals to choose their occupation and their place of employment without interference

label: Official religion
description: Creates or prohibits an official religion, national religion, or state religion; creates or prohibits special treatment for certain religions
ld: Official religion - Creates or prohibits an official religion, national religion, or state religion; creates or prohibits special treatment for certain religions

label: Ombudsman
description: Establishes an independent body to investigate improper or illegal actions that infringe on individual rights
parent_category: Regulation and Oversight/Independent Agencies and Commissions; Rights and Duties/Enforcement
ld: Ombudsman - Establishes an independent body to investigate improper or illegal actions that infringe on individual rights

label: Court opinions
description: Determines procedures for, or treatment of, judicial opinions handed down by a court
ld: Court opinions - Determines procedures for, or treatment of, judicial opinions handed down by a court

label: Wealth redistribution
description: Guarantees additional resources, funds, services, access, or opportunities to specific groups based on gender, ethnicity, disability, or any other group identity; seeks to increase economic opportunities, reduce inequalities, and use redistribution to create substantive equality
ld: Wealth redistribution - Guarantees additional resources, funds, services, access, or opportunities to specific groups based on gender, ethnicity, disability, or any other group identity; seeks to increase economic opportunities, reduce inequalities, and use redistribution to create substantive equality

label: Freedom of opinion, thought, and conscience
description: Allows individuals to believe or think anything they find compelling
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Freedom of opinion, thought, and conscience - Allows individuals to believe or think anything they find compelling

label: Ordinary court
description: Establishes the ordinary court system
ld: Ordinary court - Establishes the ordinary court system

label: Organic law
description: Special legislative process for organic laws that create fundamental aspects of the constitutional order
ld: Organic law - Special legislative process for organic laws that create fundamental aspects of the constitutional order

label: Origin
description: Country of origin, birthplace, native home, motherland, fatherland, or ethnicity
parent_category: Culture and Identity; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Origin - Country of origin, birthplace, native home, motherland, fatherland, or ethnicity

label: Veto override
description: Allows the legislature to take additional steps to pass legislation that has been vetoed by the actor responsible for approving or rejecting legislation
ld: Veto override - Allows the legislature to take additional steps to pass legislation that has been vetoed by the actor responsible for approving or rejecting legislation

label: Overthrow
description: Allows individuals to revolt, start a revolution, or overthrow the government
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Overthrow - Allows individuals to revolt, start a revolution, or overthrow the government

label: Pardon power
description: Grants an executive body power to overrule a criminal conviction
ld: Pardon power - Grants an executive body power to overrule a criminal conviction

label: Parentage
description: Relates to a person's parentage, bloodline, lineage, family, paternity, heredity, or birth
ld: Parentage - Relates to a person's parentage, bloodline, lineage, family, paternity, heredity, or birth

label: Parents
description: Grants parents certain rights or duties regarding their children; may include the duty to provide for one's legal children, or the right to make decisions about their education, upbringing, and other aspects of their lives
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Parents - Grants parents certain rights or duties regarding their children; may include the duty to provide for one's legal children, or the right to make decisions about their education, upbringing, and other aspects of their lives

label: Preferred political parties
description: Grants special status to a particular political party or type of political party
ld: Preferred political parties - Grants special status to a particular political party or type of political party

label: Prohibited political parties
description: Prohibits certain political parties or parties with particular ideologies or characteristics
ld: Prohibited political parties - Prohibits certain political parties or parties with particular ideologies or characteristics

label: Political party restrictions
description: Establishes the rules of acceptable political party activity and organizational structure
ld: Political party restrictions - Establishes the rules of acceptable political party activity and organizational structure

label: Political party formation
description: Allows individuals to form or join a political party or political organization in order to acquire and exercise political power
ld: Political party formation - Allows individuals to form or join a political party or political organization in order to acquire and exercise political power

label: Political party regulation
description: Describes which branch or body has the power to regulate political parties and determine the unconstitutionality of certain parties
ld: Political party regulation - Describes which branch or body has the power to regulate political parties and determine the unconstitutionality of certain parties

label: Petition
description: Allows individuals to bring petitions and complaints
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Petition - Allows individuals to bring petitions and complaints

label: Powers
description: Establishes the powers of a government official or institution
ld: Powers - Establishes the powers of a government official or institution

label: Preamble
description: Introductory statement at the beginning of a constitution before the main text begins
ld: Preamble - Introductory statement at the beginning of a constitution before the main text begins

label: Pre-trial release
description: Requires arrested individuals to be released from custody until the time of their trial
ld: Pre-trial release - Requires arrested individuals to be released from custody until the time of their trial

label: Presumption of innocence
description: Requires that those adjudicating a criminal trial presume the accused is ""innocent until proven guilty,"" placing the burden of proof on the side of the prosecution in the trial
ld: Presumption of innocence - Requires that those adjudicating a criminal trial presume the accused is ""innocent until proven guilty,"" placing the burden of proof on the side of the prosecution in the trial

label: Freedom of press
description: Allows individuals, journalists, and publishers free expression through all forms of media
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Freedom of press - Allows individuals, journalists, and publishers free expression through all forms of media

label: History
description: Reference to particular triumphs or tragedies in history
ld: History - Reference to particular triumphs or tragedies in history

label: Crimes of the previous regime
description: Provides transitional justice that punishes or pardons crimes committed by the previous regime
ld: Crimes of the previous regime - Provides transitional justice that punishes or pardons crimes committed by the previous regime

label: Prison registry
description: Requires a registry of the names of people imprisoned
ld: Prison registry - Requires a registry of the names of people imprisoned

label: Privacy
description: Protects individuals from intrusion into their property, papers, person, or communications without proper authorization
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Privacy - Protects individuals from intrusion into their property, papers, person, or communications without proper authorization

label: Outside professions
description: Defines outside professions that are incompatible with serving as a certain government official or bars that official from engaging in some or all other occupations during their term in office
ld: Outside professions - Defines outside professions that are incompatible with serving as a certain government official or bars that official from engaging in some or all other occupations during their term in office

label: Own property
description: Allows individuals to own real property and other objects
ld: Own property - Allows individuals to own real property and other objects

label: Employment
description: Requires provision of work to individuals
ld: Employment - Requires provision of work to individuals

label: Required political parties
description: Requires membership in a political party or in the sole political party of the state
parent_category: Elections/Political Parties; Rights and Duties/Citizen Duties
ld: Required political parties - Requires membership in a political party or in the sole political party of the state

label: Public sessions
description: Requires a government body to hold meetings in public sessions or specifies when the government body may hold meetings in private sessions
ld: Public sessions - Requires a government body to hold meetings in public sessions or specifies when the government body may hold meetings in private sessions

label: Public deliberations
description: Requires that a written record of debates or deliberations in a government body be published
ld: Public deliberations - Requires that a written record of debates or deliberations in a government body be published

label: Public trial
description: Requires individuals charged with an offense to have their trial held in public
ld: Public trial - Requires individuals charged with an offense to have their trial held in public

label: Legislative quorum
description: Requires a certain percentage of legislators to be present to hold an official legislative session
ld: Legislative quorum - Requires a certain percentage of legislators to be present to hold an official legislative session

label: Legislative quota
description: Allocates a certain number of seats in the legislature to representatives of a particular group
ld: Legislative quota - Allocates a certain number of seats in the legislature to representatives of a particular group

label: Race
description: Race or group defined by shared history or social identity
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Race and Ethnicity; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Race - Race or group defined by shared history or social identity

label: Radio
description: Reference to the wireless transmission of audio programs
ld: Radio - Reference to the wireless transmission of audio programs

label: Legislative vote transparency
description: Establishes the level of transparency in legislative voting, including making legislative votes a matter of public record or secret
ld: Legislative vote transparency - Establishes the level of transparency in legislative voting, including making legislative votes a matter of public record or secret

label: Referenda
description: Allows individuals to vote for or against a specific piece of proposed legislation in a referendum, plebiscite, or other public vote
ld: Referenda - Allows individuals to vote for or against a specific piece of proposed legislation in a referendum, plebiscite, or other public vote

label: Regional groups
description: Reference to a broader regional group, geographic region, or multilateral organization
ld: Regional groups - Reference to a broader regional group, geographic region, or multilateral organization

label: Religious law
description: Establishes the status of religious law; establishes religious law as separate or integrated with secular law, as the default law where secular law is silent, as superior to secular law, as a source or inspiration for secular law, or as the supreme source of law; establishes a repugnancy clause preventing conflict with religious law
ld: Religious law - Establishes the status of religious law; establishes religious law as separate or integrated with secular law, as the default law where secular law is silent, as superior to secular law, as a source or inspiration for secular law, or as the supreme source of law; establishes a repugnancy clause preventing conflict with religious law

label: Tax status of religious organizations
description: Grants religious organizations an exemption from taxation
ld: Tax status of religious organizations - Grants religious organizations an exemption from taxation

label: Removal
description: Establishes the grounds and competent bodies to dismiss, remove, or revoke the mandate of a government official
ld: Removal - Establishes the grounds and competent bodies to dismiss, remove, or revoke the mandate of a government official

label: Just remuneration
description: Requires just remuneration, a fair salary, minimum wage, living wage, or equal payment for work; prohibits paying employees low wages or different rates for the same work
ld: Just remuneration - Requires just remuneration, a fair salary, minimum wage, living wage, or equal payment for work; prohibits paying employees low wages or different rates for the same work

label: Eligibility
description: Qualifications that an individual must meet in order to serve as a government official; restrictions on serving as a government official
ld: Eligibility - Qualifications that an individual must meet in order to serve as a government official; restrictions on serving as a government official

label: Entry or exit restrictions
description: Restrictions on entry into or exit out of the country, particularly with regard to the movements of foreign nationals
ld: Entry or exit restrictions - Restrictions on entry into or exit out of the country, particularly with regard to the movements of foreign nationals

label: Natural resources ownership
description: Describes ownership, possession, and use of natural resources, including energy, minerals, water, forests, flora, fauna, air, land, or other natural resources; includes nationalization, privatization, and use of natural resources as a public good or consumer good
ld: Natural resources ownership - Describes ownership, possession, and use of natural resources, including energy, minerals, water, forests, flora, fauna, air, land, or other natural resources; includes nationalization, privatization, and use of natural resources as a public good or consumer good

label: Retirement age
description: Maximum age at which a public official must retire
ld: Retirement age - Maximum age at which a public official must retire

label: Rights restrictions
description: Allows restrictions on the rights of some individuals or groups
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Rights restrictions - Allows restrictions on the rights of some individuals or groups

label: Rule of law
description: Requires state actions based on the rule of law, legality, rechtsstasst, or justice; restricts the arbitrary exercise of power by requiring adherence to clear, established laws
ld: Rule of law - Requires state actions based on the rule of law, legality, rechtsstasst, or justice; restricts the arbitrary exercise of power by requiring adherence to clear, established laws

label: Safe work
description: Allows individuals to have safe working conditions free of preventable hazards
ld: Safe work - Allows individuals to have safe working conditions free of preventable hazards

label: Salary
description: Specifies the body that determines compensation for a government official; prevents tampering with the salaries of a government official
ld: Salary - Specifies the body that determines compensation for a government official; prevents tampering with the salaries of a government official

label: Science
description: Reference to science, scientific research, or innovation
ld: Science - Reference to science, scientific research, or innovation

label: Scientific benefits
description: Allows individuals to enjoy the benefits of scientific progress
ld: Scientific benefits - Allows individuals to enjoy the benefits of scientific progress

label: Legislative size
description: Total number of seats in the legislature
ld: Legislative size - Total number of seats in the legislature

label: Territory secession
description: Allows withdrawal or independence of groups or territory from a country
ld: Territory secession - Allows withdrawal or independence of groups or territory from a country

label: Selection
description: Establishes the process and bodies used to nominate and approve a government official through proportional representation, ranked-choice voting, majoritian voting, appointment, or other selection mechanisms
ld: Selection - Establishes the process and bodies used to nominate and approve a government official through proportional representation, ranked-choice voting, majoritian voting, appointment, or other selection mechanisms

label: Self determination
description: Allows people to determine their own governance
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Self determination - Allows people to determine their own governance

label: Self governance
description: Grants groups autonomy to govern themselves, particularly with regard to issues that affect their territory
ld: Self governance - Grants groups autonomy to govern themselves, particularly with regard to issues that affect their territory

label: Separation of church and state
description: Guarantees a secular state, guarantees a separation between the state and religious organizations, or forbids the state from extending recognition or assistance to religious organizations
ld: Separation of church and state - Guarantees a secular state, guarantees a separation between the state and religious organizations, or forbids the state from extending recognition or assistance to religious organizations

label: Legislative session length
description: Number of days or months that the legislature meets within a year
ld: Legislative session length - Number of days or months that the legislature meets within a year

label: Sexual orientation
description: Relates to a person's sexual orientation or status as gay, lesbian, bisexual, queer, or straight
ld: Sexual orientation - Relates to a person's sexual orientation or status as gay, lesbian, bisexual, queer, or straight

label: Shelter
description: Allows individuals to have adequate shelter or housing
ld: Shelter - Allows individuals to have adequate shelter or housing

label: Slavery
description: Forbids the practice of forced labor, servitude, and owning or otherwise exploiting human beings
ld: Slavery - Forbids the practice of forced labor, servitude, and owning or otherwise exploiting human beings

label: Social class
description: Refers to social class, social position, or social stature; outlaws or provides for social classes
parent_category: Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Social class - Refers to social class, social position, or social stature; outlaws or provides for social classes

label: Social security
description: Guarantees the social security of the society
ld: Social security - Guarantees the social security of the society

label: Fraternity and solidarity
description: Reference to fraternity or solidarity
ld: Fraternity and solidarity - Reference to fraternity or solidarity

label: Speedy trial
description: Requires individuals charged with an offense to be brought to trial without undue delay and within a reasonable time following the arrest
ld: Speedy trial - Requires individuals charged with an offense to be brought to trial without undue delay and within a reasonable time following the arrest

label: Spending law
description: Special legislative process for spending legislation on expenditures
ld: Spending law - Special legislative process for spending legislation on expenditures

label: Legislative policy areas
description: Policy areas where a chamber of the legislature has special privileges or restrictions
ld: Legislative policy areas - Policy areas where a chamber of the legislature has special privileges or restrictions

label: Standard of living
description: Allows individuals to have a reasonable standard of living, including basic needs, decent living conditions, an adequate well-being, suitable existence, quality of life, dignified life, or life worthy of a human being
ld: Standard of living - Allows individuals to have a reasonable standard of living, including basic needs, decent living conditions, an adequate well-being, suitable existence, quality of life, dignified life, or life worthy of a human being

label: Standing committees
description: Establishes permanent committees with oversight in given policy areas
ld: Standing committees - Establishes permanent committees with oversight in given policy areas

label: Strike
description: Allows individuals to cease work for a period of time to exert pressure on their employer
ld: Strike - Allows individuals to cease work for a period of time to exert pressure on their employer

label: Subsidiary unit government
description: Establishes the structures and competencies of provincial, regional, or state government
ld: Subsidiary unit government - Establishes the structures and competencies of provincial, regional, or state government

label: Replacement
description: Establishes the process and bodies competent to replace a government official before the normally scheduled replacement process; succession process
ld: Replacement - Establishes the process and bodies competent to replace a government official before the normally scheduled replacement process; succession process

label: Supreme court
description: Establishes the supreme court as the highest ordinary court
parent_category: Judiciary/Judicial Autonomy and Power; Judiciary/Supreme Court
ld: Supreme court - Establishes the supreme court as the highest ordinary court

label: Government system
description: Establishes the structure and system of government
ld: Government system - Establishes the structure and system of government

label: Tax law
description: Special legislative process for tax legislation on collecting revenue in the form of taxes or tariffs
ld: Tax law - Special legislative process for tax legislation on collecting revenue in the form of taxes or tariffs

label: Taxes requirement
description: Requires individuals to pay taxes
ld: Taxes requirement - Requires individuals to pay taxes

label: Telecommunications
description: Reference to wired or wireless communication, including telephones, satellites, the internet, and other communication technologies
ld: Telecommunications - Reference to wired or wireless communication, including telephones, satellites, the internet, and other communication technologies

label: Term length
description: Number of years that a government official serves in a term
ld: Term length - Number of years that a government official serves in a term

label: Term limit
description: Maximum number of terms that a government official serves; limit on re-election
ld: Term limit - Maximum number of terms that a government official serves; limit on re-election

label: Terrorism
description: Legal and security procedures regarding terrorism
ld: Terrorism - Legal and security procedures regarding terrorism

label: Torture
description: Forbids the use of torture or coerced confessions
ld: Torture - Forbids the use of torture or coerced confessions

label: Transitional provisions
description: Temporary text in a constitution that guides the transition from the previous system to the new system
ld: Transitional provisions - Temporary text in a constitution that guides the transition from the previous system to the new system

label: Transfer property
description: Allows individuals to dispose of property through sale, gift, wills, inheritance, or other means
ld: Transfer property - Allows individuals to dispose of property through sale, gift, wills, inheritance, or other means

label: Treaty ratification
description: Procedures to gain approval for accession to a treaty
ld: Treaty ratification - Procedures to gain approval for accession to a treaty

label: Treaty legal status
description: Establishes whether treaties are superior or inferior to domestic legal documents
ld: Treaty legal status - Establishes whether treaties are superior or inferior to domestic legal documents

label: Tribe or clan
description: Tribe, clan, or political or social group descending from a common ancestor
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Race and Ethnicity; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Tribe or clan - Tribe, clan, or political or social group descending from a common ancestor

label: Trial in native language of accused
description: Allows individuals charged with an offense to be informed of the reason for their arrest in a language they understand, to have their trial conducted in a language they understand, or to have an interpreter during detention or trial if they cannot understand the language
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Language; Rights and Duties/Legal Procedural Rights
ld: Trial in native language of accused - Allows individuals charged with an offense to be informed of the reason for their arrest in a language they understand, to have their trial conducted in a language they understand, or to have an interpreter during detention or trial if they cannot understand the language

label: Truth and reconciliation commission
description: Establishes an independent commission to hear testimony about human rights violations and other crimes committed by the previous regime
parent_category: Regulation and Oversight/Independent Agencies and Commissions
ld: Truth and reconciliation commission - Establishes an independent commission to hear testimony about human rights violations and other crimes committed by the previous regime

label: Television
description: Reference to the wireless transmission of audio-visual programs
ld: Television - Reference to the wireless transmission of audio-visual programs

label: Second chamber
description: Relates to the second or upper chamber of the legislature
ld: Second chamber - Relates to the second or upper chamber of the legislature

label: Unamendable
description: Parts of the constitutions that are so fundamental that they are unamendable
ld: Unamendable - Parts of the constitutions that are so fundamental that they are unamendable

label: Constitutionality of legislation
description: Procedures for examining whether the content of a piece of legislation adheres to the constitution
parent_category: Judiciary/Judicial Autonomy and Power; Judiciary/Judicial Review
ld: Constitutionality of legislation - Procedures for examining whether the content of a piece of legislation adheres to the constitution

label: Victims
description: Addresses needs of crime victims in the justice process
ld: Victims - Addresses needs of crime victims in the justice process

label: Voting age
description: Minimum age limit for voting in an election
ld: Voting age - Minimum age limit for voting in an election

label: Voting restrictions
description: Qualifications or restrictions on voting in an election, for example on the basis of residency, age, or registration
ld: Voting restrictions - Qualifications or restrictions on voting in an election, for example on the basis of residency, age, or registration

label: Universal suffrage
description: Allows all individuals to vote in elections to indicate their choice of candidate; allows all individuals to vote in a referendum to indicate their choice on the proposed policy
parent_category: Elections/Suffrage and Turnout; Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Universal suffrage - Allows all individuals to vote in elections to indicate their choice of candidate; allows all individuals to vote in a referendum to indicate their choice on the proposed policy

label: War
description: Allows establishing a declaration of war
ld: War - Allows establishing a declaration of war

label: Water
description: Guarantees safe, clean, or potable drinking water
ld: Water - Guarantees safe, clean, or potable drinking water

label: No punishment without law
description: Prohibits arrest, detention, prosecution, or punishment for actions that are not defined in law as crimes; prohibits sentences that are greater than those defined in law
ld: No punishment without law - Prohibits arrest, detention, prosecution, or punishment for actions that are not defined in law as crimes; prohibits sentences that are greater than those defined in law

label: Work requirement
description: Requires individuals to work
ld: Work requirement - Requires individuals to work

label: Constitution amendment
description: Mechanisms to change the text of the constitution, including constitutional amendment, reform, or replacement
ld: Constitution amendment - Mechanisms to change the text of the constitution, including constitutional amendment, reform, or replacement

label: Unamendable
description: Parts of the constitutions that are so fundamental that they are unamendable
ld: Unamendable - Parts of the constitutions that are so fundamental that they are unamendable

label: Indigenous citizenship
description: Grants indigenous peoples the status of being citizens in the political community
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Citizenship; Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous citizenship - Grants indigenous peoples the status of being citizens in the political community

label: Citizenship revocation
description: Allows or prohibits revocation of citizenship, whereby a person is stripped of his or her citizenship
ld: Citizenship revocation - Allows or prohibits revocation of citizenship, whereby a person is stripped of his or her citizenship

label: Equality regardless of nationality
description: Equality regardless of a person's nationality or status as a national or subject of a particular country
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Citizenship; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Equality regardless of nationality - Equality regardless of a person's nationality or status as a national or subject of a particular country

label: Equality regardless of origin
description: Equality regardless of a person's country of origin, birthplace, native home, motherland, fatherland, or ethnicity; protection from discrimination based on country of origin
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Citizenship; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Equality regardless of origin - Equality regardless of a person's country of origin, birthplace, native home, motherland, fatherland, or ethnicity; protection from discrimination based on country of origin

label: Citizen deportation
description: Allows or prohibits deportation of citizens or residents
ld: Citizen deportation - Allows or prohibits deportation of citizens or residents

label: Birthright citizenship
description: Grants automatic citizenship at birth; may relate to the citizenship or residency of one or both parents, or to the location of an individual's birth
ld: Birthright citizenship - Grants automatic citizenship at birth; may relate to the citizenship or residency of one or both parents, or to the location of an individual's birth

label: Naturalization
description: Grants citizenship to a foreigner through naturalization, whereby a person acquires a citizenship he or she did not have at birth
ld: Naturalization - Grants citizenship to a foreigner through naturalization, whereby a person acquires a citizenship he or she did not have at birth

label: Entry or exit restrictions
description: Restrictions on entry into or exit out of the state, particularly with regard to the movements of foreign nationals
ld: Entry or exit restrictions - Restrictions on entry into or exit out of the state, particularly with regard to the movements of foreign nationals

label: Citizenship renunciation
description: Allows individuals to renounce their citizenship
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Citizenship; Rights and Duties/Civil and Political Rights
ld: Citizenship renunciation - Allows individuals to renounce their citizenship

label: Indigenous not pay taxes
description: Grants indigenous peoples an exemption from taxation or required financial charges levied on residents
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous not pay taxes - Grants indigenous peoples an exemption from taxation or required financial charges levied on residents

label: Indigenous illegal activities
description: Grants indigenous peoples an exemption from laws that apply to the non-indigenous population
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous illegal activities - Grants indigenous peoples an exemption from laws that apply to the non-indigenous population

label: Indigenous political parties
description: Allows indigenous peoples to form political parties on the basis of group identity in order to acquire and exercise political power
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Elections/Political Parties; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous political parties - Allows indigenous peoples to form political parties on the basis of group identity in order to acquire and exercise political power

label: Indigenous representation
description: Guarantees representation to indigenous peoples, for example, through reserved seats or quotas in the legislature
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous representation - Guarantees representation to indigenous peoples, for example, through reserved seats or quotas in the legislature

label: Indigenous self governance
description: Grants indigenous peoples autonomy to govern themselves, particularly with regard to issues that affect their territory
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous self governance - Grants indigenous peoples autonomy to govern themselves, particularly with regard to issues that affect their territory

label: Indigenous vote
description: Grants indigenous peoples the ability to vote in national elections or referenda, indicating their choice of candidate or course of action
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Indigenous Groups; Elections/Suffrage and Turnout; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Indigenous vote - Grants indigenous peoples the ability to vote in national elections or referenda, indicating their choice of candidate or course of action

label: Equality regardless of language
description: Equality regardless of a person's language or the shared system of words used to communicate
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Language; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Equality regardless of language - Equality regardless of a person's language or the shared system of words used to communicate

label: Official languages
description: Establishes official languages or national languages that are given special status, including endoglossic and exoglossic languages
ld: Official languages - Establishes official languages or national languages that are given special status, including endoglossic and exoglossic languages

label: Language protection
description: Allows individuals to use their native language, requires protection of different languages, or requires neutrality toward languages
ld: Language protection - Allows individuals to use their native language, requires protection of different languages, or requires neutrality toward languages

label: Trial in native language of accused
description: Allows individuals charged with an offense to be informed of the reason for their arrest in a language they understand, to have their trial conducted in a language they understand, or to have an interpreter during detention or trial if they cannot understand the language
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Language; Rights and Duties/Legal Procedural Rights
ld: Trial in native language of accused - Allows individuals charged with an offense to be informed of the reason for their arrest in a language they understand, to have their trial conducted in a language they understand, or to have an interpreter during detention or trial if they cannot understand the language

label: Equality regardless of race
description: Equality regardless of a person's race or group defined by shared history or social identity
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Race and Ethnicity; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Equality regardless of race - Equality regardless of a person's race or group defined by shared history or social identity

label: Equality regardless of tribe or clan
description: Equality regardless of a person's tribe, clan, or political or social group descending from a common ancestor; protection from discrimination based on tribe or clan
parent_category: Culture and Identity/Race and Ethnicity; Rights and Duties/Equality, Gender, and Minority Rights
ld: Equality regardless of tribe or clan - Equality regardless of a person's tribe, clan, or political or social group descending from a common ancestor; protection from discrimination based on tribe or clan

label: Ethnic community integration
description: Allows integration and partlcipation of minority ethnic communities; protects minority ethnic communities against forced assimilation; supports multinationalism, plurinationalism, or recognition of indigenous peoples

description: Allows individuals to appeal a judicial decision in a higher court if they are not satisfied with the outcome in the court of first instance
ld: Appeal - Allows individuals to appeal a judicial decision in a higher court if they are not satisfied with the outcome in the court of first instance

label: Counsel
description: Allows arrested individuals to have legal counsel
ld: Counsel - Allows arrested individuals to have legal counsel

label: Evidence examination
description: Allows accused offenders and their legal counsel to cross-examine evidence or witnesses brought against them
ld: Evidence examination - Allows accused offenders and their legal counsel to cross-examine evidence or witnesses brought against them

label: Fair trial
description: Provides for a fair, impartial trial; protects individuals from unfair trial procedures
ld: Fair trial - Provides for a fair, impartial trial; protects individuals from unfair trial procedures

label: Pre-trial defense
description: Requires arrested individuals to be released from custody until the time of their trial
ld: Pre-trial defense - Requires arrested individuals to be released from custody until the time of their trial

label: Public trial
description: Requires individuals charged with an offense to have their trial held in public
ld: Public trial - Requires individuals charged with an offense to have their trial held in public

label: Speedy trial
description: Requires individuals charged with an offense to be brought to trial without undue delay and within a reasonable time following the arrest
ld: Speedy trial - Requires individuals charged with an offense to be brought to trial without undue delay and within a reasonable time following the arrest

label: Death penalty
description: Forbids use of the death penalty as a punishment
ld: Death penalty - Forbids use of the death penalty as a punishment

label: Corporal punishment
description: Forbids inflicting physical harm as a punishment
ld: Corporal punishment - Forbids inflicting physical harm as a punishment

label: Cruel treatment
description: Forbids inhumane treatment or treating individuals in any way that offends human dignity
ld: Cruel treatment - Forbids inhumane treatment or treating individuals in any way that offends human dignity

label: Slavery
description: Forbids the practice of forced labor, servitude, and owning or otherwise exploiting human beings

label: Torture
description: Forbids the use of torture or coerced confessions
ld: Torture - Forbids the use of torture or coerced confessions

label: Life
description: Guarantees a right to life

label: Higher education
description: Guarantees individuals equal access to higher education
ld: Higher education - Guarantees individuals equal access to higher education

label: Compulsory education
description: Requires children to attend school

label: Free education
description: Requires the provision of education free of charge
ld: Free education - Requires the provision of education free of charge

label: Child employment
description: Prohibits or limits child labor to protect children from exploitation
ld: Child employment - Prohibits or limits child labor to protect children from exploitation

label: Consumers
description: Protects consumers from harmful products and/or predatory or unethical business practices
ld: Consumers - Protects consumers from harmful products and/or predatory or unethical business practices

label: Environment
description: Requires protection or preservation of the environment
ld: Environment - Requires protection or preservation of the environment

label: Scientific benefits
description: Allows individuals to enjoy the benefits of scientific progress
ld: Scientific benefits - Allows individuals to enjoy the benefits of scientific progress

label: Equal pay for equal work
description: Requires just remuneration, a fair salary, minimum wage, living wge, or equal payment for work; prohibits paying employees low wages or different rates for the same work
ld: Equal pay for equal work - Requires just remuneration, a fair salary, minimum wage, living wge, or equal payment for work; prohibits paying employees low wages or different rates for the same work

label: Health care
description: Provides health care to individuals

label: Trade union
description: Allows individuals to form and join trade unions or professional organizations
ld: Trade union - Allows individuals to form and join trade unions or professional organizations

label: Standard of living
description: Allows individuals to have a reasonable standard of living, including basic needs, decent living conditions, an adequate well-being, suitable existence, quality of life, dignified life, or life worthy of a human being

label: Leisure
description: Allows individuals to have leisure, including vacations, weekly holidays, or leaves with pay

label: Safe work
description: Allows individuals to have safe working conditions free of preventable hazards

label: Shelter
description: Allows individuals to have adequate shelter or housing

label: Strike
description: Allows individuals to cease work for a period of time to exert pressure on their employer

label: Employment

label: Support for the disabled
